summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeJoico Power Spray Fast-Dry Finishing Spray takes ultra-firm hold to a whole new level, increasing shine by 170%, protecting against humidity and heat styling…while it locks in your hairstyle for a full 3 full days.
details: DetailsBenefitsUltra-Firm holding powerHumidity protection and hold up to 72-hoursThermal protection up to 450 F (232 C)UVA/UVB protectionProtects against pollution*Paraben-freeFree of SLS/SLES Sulfates***Laboratory tested using pollution particles** SLS/SLES Sulfates = sodium lauryl sulfate/sodium laureth sulfateItem 2579863How To UseHolding can 8-10 inches from hair, give a gentle pass over your entire 'do, or spritz in spots as a placeholder. Apply a second time for a stronger hold.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152A, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Pentapeptide-29 Cysteinamide, Pentapeptide-30 Cysteinamide, Tetrapeptide-28 Argininamide, Tetrapeptide-29 Argininamide, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Thermus Thermophillus Ferment, Glycerin, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Opal Powder, Polyquaternium-69, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aminomethyl Propanol, PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetracaprylate/Tetracaprate, Triethyl Citrate, Benzophenone-4, Butylene Glycol, Limonene, Linalool, Fragrance/Parfum.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Holding can 8-10 inches from hair, give a gentle pass over your entire 'do, or spritz in spots as a placeholder. Apply a second time for a stronger hold.

reviews.headline: Great hair spray. Does not feel stiff. Soft and fluffy.
reviews.comments: I love the sample bags, let's me try many different products.

reviews.headline: No better than drugstore hairspray
reviews.comments: This made my hair crunchy, didn't add shine, and didn't hold my bangs in place all day so I'll finish the can but will not be repurchasing. Might as well use a drugstore hairspray. I bought it because Sabrina Carpenter's hair stylist mentioned using it at coachella. Was definitely sponsored by joico cuz this product is meh.

reviews.headline: just okay
reviews.comments: rather disappointed in this purchase.

reviews.headline: EHHHH
reviews.comments: Why did they change this? I used the original Power Spray in the old can for over a decade. I have long fine hair and it didn't weigh my hair down and almost had a powdery thing going on that added volume. This works fine, I guess. I don't care for the new smell and knew immediately that it was NOT just the packaging that changed.

reviews.headline: I do buy this over and over again
reviews.comments: Dries fast and holds for hours

reviews.headline: Did not care for this spray
reviews.comments: Ulta was still out of my favorite Redken hairspray so I had to find a different brand. I like the Joico shampoo and conditioner so I thought I would give it a chance. Made my hair too stiff.

reviews.headline: Soooo Disappointed!
reviews.comments: After Redken 18 Quick Dry was discontinued I discovered this hairspray and loved it. I thought I had finally found a replacement until I bought my second can which was the new formula. Absolutely horrible! Could not get past the smell. I returned and will not be buying again. Why  mess up a good thing?

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again & again!!!
reviews.comments: love the hold without the sticky nor stiff feel

reviews.headline: Not at all the same!
reviews.comments: I was faithful to this hairspray for years. It would hold my curls for 2 days. The formula changed and now it lasts 1 hours tops. Total disappointment

reviews.headline: Not the same
reviews.comments: This used to be my favorite hair spray. Unfortunately, not anymore they have completely change drastically. The great smell it once had no longer exist. The ingredients is not the same . Will be returning

reviews.headline: I will be purchasing it again
reviews.comments: Love the way it doesn't feel like heavy hairspray.  You don't need much to have a great hold on your hair. Seems to last longer also.

reviews.headline: Not the same : (
reviews.comments: This has been my favorite hairspray for years.  Nver flaked, never weighed my hair down, smelled amazing.  The new can/formulation is horrific!  The smell is so bad that I will be returning it.  So, so disappointed

reviews.headline: My new go to!!!
reviews.comments: Love this product! A fellow shopper turned me onto to this brand. Later Kendra….for awhile anyway lol.

reviews.headline: I would purchase this product again.
reviews.comments: I really like the hair spray - better than the cheap-cheap hair spray and just as good as the very expensive hair spray. Yes, I would purchase it again.

reviews.headline: I highly recommend
reviews.comments: Best hairspray ever!

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: Really like this product but they're always out of the one that I want which is number 9 or number 8

reviews.headline: Change is NOT always good
reviews.comments: Product has changed, smell is very strong - overpowering and the formula feels heavier and kind of greasy feeling. I won't purchase this anymore. Sadly as I've used this for years, now I have to find another.

reviews.headline: outstanding results
reviews.comments: Love Joico products!  power hold that you can touch!   be sure to use #9-10 for stronger hold.

reviews.headline: Not as good as Redken
reviews.comments: I bought this because they were out of the Redken Control Addict so I hoped this was a good alternative.  It goes on light and it it's not crunchy but it doesn't hold as well as the Redken.

reviews.headline: Great hairspray
reviews.comments: Don't understand the negative reviews. Love the way it holds my hair and the smell is not awful like so many said it was.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm love this incredible Joico power spray, and I must say, it has been a game-changer for my hair routine. Living in a humid climate(Houston), I've always struggled with frizz and flyaways, making it nearly impossible to maintain a sleek look throughout the day. This hairspray, however, has completely altered that reality for me.

From the moment I styled my hair in the morning, I could tell this was not your ordinary hairspray. It felt lightweight and didn't leave that dreaded sticky residue that many others do. But the true test came as I stepped outside into the humidity, and to my amazement, my hair remained impeccable. The frizz that typically would have made an appearance by midday was nowhere to be found, and my style held perfectly in place. Even during a rainy day!

What I appreciate most about this product is not just its effectiveness, but also how it manages to maintain hold without compromising the natural feel of my hair. It's as if I haven't applied any product at all! Plus, it washes out easily, which is a huge bonus.

In conclusion, this power hold hairspray has earned a permanent spot in my beauty arsenal. For anyone struggling with frizz or looking for a reliable hairspray that truly holds all day, I cannot recommend this product enough. It has surpassed all my expectations and has proven to be the ultimate solution for achieving and maintaining sleek, frizz-free hair, regardless of the weather conditions.

I received a complimentary product for this review.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing hold in high humidity!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have fine naturally curly 3a/3b red hair, with low porosity. It is easily dried out. My usual routine involves curl cream, gel for a cast, and mousse for volume. I saw a video recently for a curly influencer who suggested using hairspray instead of the curl cream + mousse. I liked the idea of simplifying my routine, so I got this because I've been happy with Joico in the past. 

Here is the good stuff: 
- It provides excellent hold, so from that perspective it does exactly what you'd expect out of a hair spray. 
- The smell is light and pleasant and doesn't linger too much. This means it won't compete with your nice perfume or clash with any other products you might be using in your hair. 
- The hold lasts through the day and into subsequent days. In this, I was very impressed. 

The not so great for curly hair
- I have fine hair. I like my curls to 'clump' into larger ringlets. I found when I used this, my curls at the side and back would muss up overnight (even though I sleep on a satin pillowcase) and would tangle and become a mess. When I rewet my hair the following day, I got tiny spaghetti curls instead. 
- It is very drying. I don't know what ingredient did this (alcohol?) but it left my normally silky hair feeling like straw. This may be typical of hair sprays generally. It just wasn't something I enjoyed feeling anytime I touched my hair (my partner commented on it too).

So the bottom line is that it smells good and it works well, but would be far better suited to someone with a smooth or straightened style.  I still recommend it as a result, because it definitely had hold, it wasn't obnoxiously smelly (like so many hair sprays!)  and it definitely lasted throughout an entire long day.
faceoff_negative.headline: Does its job properly but not great for fine curly hair
